title: What's In The Box?
description: The KAJ make good on their promise to review the all time greatest kids sports movies by diving deep on Space Jam and Little Giants. But before that, there’s a voicemail about sports tattoos (00:50), A Make Up Wipe Update (13:13) and a DJ Magic the Gathering: The Gathering Pt 2 recap (19:00). Then Ashley digs into Space Jam (33:30), and later, Katie finally speaks on Little Giants (1:16:24).
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: The KAJ keep their promise to review all the greatest kids sports movies!
